original: sa
analyzed: sa
translated: The🔽

original: ga_@#/_/lha mchod pa'i rim pa/🔽@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_'dod pa'i dngos grub dbang du bya ba'i phyir lha mchod pa ston de
analyzed: ga_@#/_/lha mchod pa'i rim pa/ @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_'dod pa'i dngos grub dbang du bya ba'i phyir lha mchod pa ston de
translated: The Stages of Making Offerings🔽In Sanskrit: Devapūjākrama🔽In Tibetan: Lha chö pa’i rim pa

original: wa pu tsha kra ma/_bod skad du/_lha mchod pa'i rim pa/_rje btshun sgrol ma la phyag
analyzed: wa pu tsha kra ma/_bod skad du/_lha mchod pa'i rim pa/_rje btshun sgrol ma la phyag
translated: Homage to the noble Tārā!🔽Those who wish to gather the accumulation of merit should first make offerings to the deity.🔽The purpose of making offerings to the deity is taught.

original: 'tshhal lo/_/bsod nams kyi tshhogs bsags par 'dod pas dang po ste lha mchod pa'i dgos pa ston las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas mngon gsum du lha mnyes nas/_mnyes pa'i stobs kyis mngon par
analyzed: 'tshhal lo/_/bsod nams kyi tshhogs bsags par 'dod pas dang po ste lha mchod pa'i dgos pa ston las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas mngon gsum du lha mnyes nas/_mnyes pa'i stobs kyis mngon par
translated: The yoga practitioner who is a beginner, having pleased the deity in a direct perception,

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub dbang du bya ba'i phyir lha gang mnyes par byed na 'dod pa'i lha'i
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub dbang du bya ba'i phyir lha gang mnyes par byed na 'dod pa'i lha'i
translated: through the power of being pleased, in order to bring the desired siddhi under control,🔽to which deity should one make offerings?🔽The deity of one’s desire.🔽What is the way to please the deity?

original: thugs dam yongs su bskul ba ni/_cis mnyes par byed na mchod pa chen po yin te/
analyzed: thugs dam yongs su bskul ba ni/_cis mnyes par byed na mchod pa chen po yin te/
translated: It is the great offering.🔽In this way, first the practitioner

original: 'di ltar dang por rnal 'byor pas/_gnyis pa ste pu tsha byin gyis brlab cing bsham pa ston te/_lo zla
analyzed: 'di ltar dang por rnal 'byor pas/_gnyis pa ste pu tsha byin gyis brlab cing bsham pa ston te/_lo zla
translated: The second is the consecration and arrangement of the pūjā.

original: tshhes grangs dus byin gyis rlab pa yin gsung mkha' 'gro ma 'pho ba'i dus shes par byas la/
analyzed: tshhes grangs dus byin gyis rlab pa yin gsung mkha' 'gro ma 'pho ba'i dus shes par byas la/
translated: The time of the dakinis' transference is known.

original: rdzas sngags phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin dbyangs dang lnga'o lnga'i mchod pa'i yo byad phyi dang /_lnga'i nang dang / 'dod yon gyi lha mo spros te gsang ba dang /_de kho na'i la gnas pa'i pu tsha rim pa rnams byin
analyzed: rdzas sngags phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin dbyangs dang lnga'o lnga'i mchod pa'i yo byad phyi dang /_lnga'i nang dang / 'dod yon gyi lha mo spros te gsang ba dang /_de kho na'i la gnas pa'i pu tsha rim pa rnams byin
translated: The outer offerings are the five offerings of substance, mantra, mudra, samadhi, and melody; the inner offerings are the five nectars; and the secret offerings are the emanation of goddesses of the sense desirables.

original: gyis brlab pa rnams tshhul bzhin du byas la te/_gsum pa ste pu tsha'i yul bstan pa don dam pa'i
analyzed: gyis brlab pa rnams tshhul bzhin du byas la te/_gsum pa ste pu tsha'i yul bstan pa don dam pa'i
translated: The consecration of the three realms is performed as usual.🔽The third, the ultimate offering to the deity, is the teaching of the land of Pundravardhana.

original: lha mchod pa'i rim pa
analyzed: lha mchod pa'i rim pa
translated: The stages of offering to the deity

original: bden par rtogs par bskyed pas spro ba med pa'i don la lhag par mos pa'i blo sngon du song
analyzed: bden par rtogs par bskyed pas spro ba med pa'i don la lhag par mos pa'i blo sngon du song
translated: are preceded by the mind that has superior devotion to the meaning of non-emanation through the generation of the realization of the truth.🔽Furthermore, it is for both oneself and others.

original: bas de yang bdag dang gzhan gnyis gi'i 'o/_/ji ltar na mngon par 'dod pa ltar rang gi 'dod pa'i
analyzed: bas de yang bdag dang gzhan gnyis gi'i 'o/_/ji ltar na mngon par 'dod pa ltar rang gi 'dod pa'i
translated: How?

original: lha'i cho ga bzhin skyed pa dang /_ye shes sems pa sgrub pa dang /_ting nge
analyzed: lha'i cho ga bzhin skyed pa dang /_ye shes sems pa sgrub pa dang /_ting nge
translated: As desired, one generates according to the rite of one's desired deity, accomplishes the gnosis being, and the samadhi being.

original: 'dzin sems pa'i gnyis med 'dres pa'i thugs ka nas ting nge 'dzin mtshhon gang ba'i snying ga nas 'od
analyzed: 'dzin sems pa'i gnyis med 'dres pa'i thugs ka nas ting nge 'dzin mtshhon gang ba'i snying ga nas 'od
translated: From the heart of the samādhi being, light rays radiate from the heart,

original: zer las/_pam chad pa las kun tu bzang po yab yum du skyed la/_de nyid snyoms par
analyzed: zer las/_pam chad pa las kun tu bzang po yab yum du skyed la/_de nyid snyoms par
translated: and from the syllable paṃ, the father and mother Samantabhadra are generated.🔽From their union, they melt into light,

original: zhugs pa las de 'od du zhu ba las/_nyi ma ring ba las thung ba'am thung ba las ring bar 'gro ba'i dus 'ong
analyzed: zhugs pa las de 'od du zhu ba las/_nyi ma ring ba las thung ba'am thung ba las ring bar 'gro ba'i dus 'ong
translated: and from that, the sun is generated.🔽At that time, the dakinis are unpredictable.

original: tshhes grangs bzang po'i dus des mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis ma nges pa'o/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas/_kha
analyzed: tshhes grangs bzang po'i dus des mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis ma nges pa'o/_/chos kyi 'byung gnas/_kha
translated: The dharmodaya is white,

original: dog dkar ba/_zhabs phra ba/_kha yel ba/_dbyibs gru gsum gyi rnam par
analyzed: dog dkar ba/_zhabs phra ba/_kha yel ba/_dbyibs gru gsum gyi rnam par
translated: with a narrow base, an open top, and the shape of a triangle.🔽After meditating on that, from the mind of the samādhi being,

original: bsgoms la/_de nas ting nge 'dzin sems pa las/_chos 'byung nang du hri chad pa
analyzed: bsgoms la/_de nas ting nge 'dzin sems pa las/_chos 'byung nang du hri chad pa
translated: the syllable hrīḥ is visualized inside the dharmodaya.🔽From that, a lotus stalk with one thousand petals is generated.

original: las/_pad+ma'i sdong po 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze 'bru la/_nyi ma'am zla
analyzed: las/_pad+ma'i sdong po 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze 'bru la/_nyi ma'am zla
translated: On the anthers of the lotus, a sun or moon maṇḍala is generated.

original: ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa skyed la/_de'i steng du ting 'dzin sems dpa' las yi ge a
analyzed: ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa skyed la/_de'i steng du ting 'dzin sems dpa' las yi ge a
translated: On top of that, the syllable aṃ of the samādhi being is generated.

original: las rtags pa yab yum rnam snang du gyur pa dang /_de'i yang snyoms par zhugs pa las 'od
analyzed: las rtags pa yab yum rnam snang du gyur pa dang /_de'i yang snyoms par zhugs pa las 'od
translated: The karma-mudra father-mother become Vairochana, and from their union light🔽melts into the celestial mansion, which is made of precious substances, without

original: du zhu ba las/_gzhal yas khang rgyu rin po che las grub pa ma gas ma chag 'phan med pa/
analyzed: du zhu ba las/_gzhal yas khang rgyu rin po che las grub pa ma gas ma chag 'phan med pa/
translated: any cracks, holes, or flaws,

original: phyogs  su ma papa/_las kyang 'od zer sna tshhogs 'phro ba/_mthong ba tsham
analyzed: phyogs  su ma papa/_las kyang 'od zer sna tshhogs 'phro ba/_mthong ba tsham
translated: not biased toward any direction, and radiating various rays of light.🔽Meditate on this as being very beautiful to behold.

original: nyams dga' ba chen po bsgom _la/_slar bsgoms pa de khang pa'i nang du 'gron gyi bzhin du 'ong
analyzed: nyams dga' ba chen po bsgom _la/_slar bsgoms pa de khang pa'i nang du 'gron gyi bzhin du 'ong
translated: Then, like a guest leaving a house, the celestial mansion dissolves into🔽the crown of one’s head.

original: rang nyid kyi lus ji ltar mos pa'i tshhogs kyi rnam par sprul nas gzhal yas khang
analyzed: rang nyid kyi lus ji ltar mos pa'i tshhogs kyi rnam par sprul nas gzhal yas khang
translated: One’s body emanates in the form of a multitude of whatever one wishes,🔽and one sits in the celestial mansion.

original: de'i nang du 'khod de/_dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa dang /_bzhi pa ste ji ltar
analyzed: de'i nang du 'khod de/_dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa dang /_bzhi pa ste ji ltar
translated: The celestial mansion becomes the great mandala.🔽The fourth is the explanation of the offerings.🔽This body of one’s ripened aspect is like a shadow that is cut off from

original: mchod pa bstan no/_/bdag gi rnam smin gyi rnam pa'i lus 'di grib ma'i tshhul du logs
analyzed: mchod pa bstan no/_/bdag gi rnam smin gyi rnam pa'i lus 'di grib ma'i tshhul du logs
translated: the body.

original: su chad pa yang lhar chad pa'o/_/chad pa las/_de'i thugs ka nas mchod pa'i lha mo
analyzed: su chad pa yang lhar chad pa'o/_/chad pa las/_de'i thugs ka nas mchod pa'i lha mo
translated: From that, offering goddesses emerge from the heart.

original: mang po spros spos dang me tog dang zhal zas la sogs pa spros pas/_mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pas
analyzed: mang po spros spos dang me tog dang zhal zas la sogs pa spros pas/_mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pas
translated: The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.🔽The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches of the mandala.🔽The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.🔽The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.

original: mchod pa dang /_lnga pa ste lhas 'gro don mdzad pa bstan pa ste dkyil 'khor gyi tshhogs bla ma dang
analyzed: mchod pa dang /_lnga pa ste lhas 'gro don mdzad pa bstan pa ste dkyil 'khor gyi tshhogs bla ma dang
translated: The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches of the mandala.🔽The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.🔽The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches of the mandala.

original: bcas pa mnyes nas 'od zer 'phros shing khyab sems can gyi tshhogs thams cad la mchod
analyzed: bcas pa mnyes nas 'od zer 'phros shing khyab sems can gyi tshhogs thams cad la mchod
translated: The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.🔽The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches of the mandala.🔽The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.

original: pa 'dod yon gyi dga' bas rgya chen po byin pas/_dmyal ba yan chad sems can dang /_lha de🔽dag kyang 'dod yon gyi pu tsha nyams su myong ba tsham gyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed nas/
analyzed: pa 'dod yon gyi dga' bas rgya chen po byin pas/_dmyal ba yan chad sems can dang /_lha de dag kyang 'dod yon gyi pu tsha nyams su myong ba tsham gyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed nas/
translated: The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches of the mandala.🔽The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.🔽The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches of the mandala.

original: lam ches che ba la zhugs te sdom pa gsum la gnas shing rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod kyi lam
analyzed: lam ches che ba la zhugs te sdom pa gsum la gnas shing rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod kyi lam
translated: The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.🔽The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.🔽The offering of the five branches is the offering of the five branches of the mandala.🔽The offering of the five elixirs is the offering of the five elixirs.🔽The offering of the five sense offerings is the offering of the five sense offerings.

original: phyag rgya bzhi rgyud la skyes nas/nas gong ltar tshhogs rgya chen po bsags nas kun gzhi'i rnam par
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi rgyud la skyes nas/nas gong ltar tshhogs rgya chen po bsags nas kun gzhi'i rnam par
translated: The offering of the five

original: shes pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes/_bde ba chen po rtogs pa dang bral ba'i ro
analyzed: shes pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes/_bde ba chen po rtogs pa dang bral ba'i ro
translated: The wisdom of unobstructed consciousness is the taste of great bliss free from realization.

original: mchog sku nyams su btar nas/_gong ltar don chen po sgrub pas na rang gi nyams dga' ba skye
analyzed: mchog sku nyams su btar nas/_gong ltar don chen po sgrub pas na rang gi nyams dga' ba skye
translated: Having experienced the supreme body, since one accomplishes the great meaning as before, one’s own experience is delighted.🔽The praise is “the praise of the one who is delighted in oneself.”

original: ba'i bstod pa/_mnyam nyid bud+d+ha dang sems can mnyam pas na mi g.yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa🔽brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i da la'i tshag rdzas dang dkyil 'khor chen po lha tshhogs rang
analyzed: ba'i bstod pa/_mnyam nyid bud+d+ha dang sems can mnyam pas na mi g.yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i da la'i tshag rdzas dang dkyil 'khor chen po lha tshhogs rang
translated: Since the buddhas and sentient beings are the same in uniformity, one should say, “the immovable,” and so on.

original: bzhin gyi ye shes 'gro ba rnams gnyis sbyong ba'i phyir rdo rje'i tshhig brjod pa rang gi lus la dbang bskur ba
analyzed: bzhin gyi ye shes 'gro ba rnams gnyis sbyong ba'i phyir rdo rje'i tshhig brjod pa rang gi lus la dbang bskur ba
translated: Then, in order to purify the two obscurations of migrating beings, the vajra words are uttered for the purpose of the great maṇḍala of the intrinsic nature of the assembly of deities.

original: dang /_bkra shis kyi tshhigs su bcad pa bkra shis ngo bo dag gyur te/_/sems la dbang ni thob par shog
analyzed: dang /_bkra shis kyi tshhigs su bcad pa bkra shis ngo bo dag gyur te/_/sems la dbang ni thob par shog
translated: The empowerment is conferred on one’s body, and the verses of auspiciousness are recited.

original: rdo rje'i glu ru gyur pa brjod nas/_khyod don chen po 'di ltar byed mkhan yin zer nas don 'di ltar
analyzed: rdo rje'i glu ru gyur pa brjod nas/_khyod don chen po 'di ltar byed mkhan yin zer nas don 'di ltar
translated: Having uttered the vajra song, “You are the one who performs this great meaning,” one should say, “This meaning is like this.”

original: gyur par yang bsam phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyang gzhal yas khang de'i ngo bo
analyzed: gyur par yang bsam phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyang gzhal yas khang de'i ngo bo
translated: Imagine that the entire external world of the environment is the nature of the celestial mansion.

original: nyid du dmigs/_nang bcud kyi sems can thams cad kyang lha'i dkyil 'khor
analyzed: nyid du dmigs/_nang bcud kyi sems can thams cad kyang lha'i dkyil 'khor
translated: Imagine that all the beings within it are the nature of the mandala of deities.

original: de dag gi ngo bo nyid du dmigs/_de dag thams cad kyang de ltar snang ba de kun rdzob sgyu ma
analyzed: de dag gi ngo bo nyid du dmigs/_de dag thams cad kyang de ltar snang ba de kun rdzob sgyu ma
translated: Imagine that all of them appear in that way as the relative illusion

original: tsham du rang rig pa'i rnam 'phrul tsham du dmigs la/_don dam par na rang rig pa
analyzed: tsham du rang rig pa'i rnam 'phrul tsham du dmigs la/_don dam par na rang rig pa
translated: . Ultimately, they are the natural radiance of one’s awareness,

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ngang la mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/_/🔽drug pa ste pu tsha'i phan yon stan pa'o/_/bdag gi re ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshhe 'dir yang phran tshhegs kyi🔽dngos grub dngos grub gnas su bstan pa dang /_skye ba 'phos nas zhing khams ji lta ba'i
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ngang la mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/_/ drug pa ste pu tsha'i phan yon stan pa'o/_/bdag gi re ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshhe 'dir yang phran tshhegs kyi dngos grub dngos grub gnas su bstan pa dang /_skye ba 'phos nas zhing khams ji lta ba'i
translated: emptiness. Rest in equipoise in that state.🔽The benefits of the vase empowerment🔽. The benefits of the vase empowerment are as follows. The vase empowerment is the empowerment of the vase of the nirmāṇakāya.

original: dbang 'byor pa'i bde ba can la sogs par ro/_/lung nges par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de
analyzed: dbang 'byor pa'i bde ba can la sogs par ro/_/lung nges par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de
translated: The benefits of the vase empowerment are as follows. The vase empowerment is the empowerment of the vase of the nirmāṇakāya.

original: ltar rgyun du tshhogs bsags pa de'i lha mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: ltar rgyun du tshhogs bsags pa de'i lha mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: Thus, the stages of deity worship in the continual accumulation of merit are complete.

original: lha mchod pa'i rim pa
analyzed: lha mchod pa'i rim pa
translated: The Stages of Deity Worship
